attributes.action: realise Stephen Fry's greatness as a genius both comically and acedemic and support him in our wish for him to be a minister in your government!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned understand that for the time being our beloved Mr Fry cannot become Prime Minister until it is time for you to retire but we would like you to invite him to become a minister or even just a political consultant as he is amazing and the country love him!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
